name: Blades & Gentle Nails
description:
New art every click! «Blades & Gentle Nails» it's a tribute to abstraction painters who lived in XX century. Geometric abstraction.

Press M key to show menu to change:
• color palette: [original] [extended]
• canvas ratio: [fullsize] [square]
• effect: [noised] [clean]

For full experience: open this script directly on IPFS so you can see a full URL with:
• &hash=0x777aa... — seed for pseudo random geometry generation
• &square=1 — canvas ratio
• &extended=1 — color palette
• &render=1 — secret option ;) use with S key
• &size=2 — secret option about pixel density

Because of hash seed, you can share the IPFS link with each other and they will see the same picture.

PS: Some details depend on viewport size and ratio. Resize window and feel free to experiment!

CC-NC-ND 4.0
